video.title: Hart of Dixie
video.synopsis: Fast-talking city girl Zoe Hart winds up patching up the locals of a tiny town in the Deep South when she inherits a medical practice in Alabama.

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Zoe Hart, a fast-talking New Yorker, feels out of place trying to adjust to life in a small southern town -- but she just might find she belongs.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Zoe agrees to join the mayor on his Founder's Day parade float, but Lemon and the BlueBell residents see her efforts to fit in as crashing the event.
episodes.title: Parades & Pariahs

episodes.synopsis: Zoe hopes to win BlueBell's gumbo contest... and get some patients. Lavon develops a crush on Zoe's new receptionist, Didi.
episodes.title: Gumbo & Glory

episodes.synopsis: Inhibitions -- including Zoe's -- are lost during a heat wave. Lemon's emotions get the best of her when she sees Lavon with his date, Didi.
episodes.title: In Havoc & In Heat

episodes.synopsis: Zoe discovers something shocking about the local minister and his wife. Lemon must convince Lavon to choose her funding proposal.
episodes.title: Faith & Infidelity

episodes.synopsis: Zoe may have seen a ghost. Plus, Zoe's mom comes to town in hopes of reconciling, and Lavon won't authorize Lemon and George's dream home purchase.
episodes.title: The Undead & the Unsaid

episodes.synopsis: Zoe is asked out by a handsome veterinarian, and when NASCAR's Brian Vickers drops out of co-hosting an event with Lemon, Lavon replaces him.
episodes.title: The Crush & the Crossbow

episodes.synopsis: George and Wade hatch a plan to get even with their high school nemesis, Jimmy. When Lemon catches wind of their scheme, she wants in on the action.
episodes.title: Homecoming & Coming Home

episodes.synopsis: BlueBell prepares for "Planksgiving." Lavon tells Wade to be honest about his feelings for Zoe, and George is offered an out-of-town opportunity.
episodes.title: The Pirate & the Practice

episodes.synopsis: It's Christmas in BlueBell. Lemon's history is revealed in flashbacks, including the beginnings of her connection with Lavon.
episodes.title: Hairdos & Holidays

episodes.synopsis: Zoe discovers, much to Lemon's dismay, that she is a legacy to the BlueBell Belles. Wade helps Lavon get back into the dating scene.
episodes.title: Hell's Belles

episodes.synopsis: Zoe hides her new friendship with AnnaBeth, who doesn't want Lemon to find out. Lemon campaigns to become the Belles' new Memory Matron.
episodes.title: Mistresses & Misunderstandings

episodes.synopsis: Zoe decides that it's too soon in her relationship with Judson to go to the annual Sweetie Pie Dance, so she makes plans for a sleepover with Rose.
episodes.title: Sweetie Pies & Sweaty Palms

episodes.synopsis: Wade convinces Lemon to dress up as Joelle as part of a scheme. Lavon asks Zoe to help figure out why Didi has been avoiding him.
episodes.title: Aliens & Aliases

episodes.synopsis: Snow in BlueBell? Plus, when Lavon's parents visit BlueBell, Lavon thinks it's the perfect chance to introduce them to Didi.
episodes.title: Snowflakes & Soulmates

episodes.synopsis: George is BlueBell's Man of the Year, and Lavon is expected to host a party in his honor. Zoe steps in to help, but things take a disastrous turn.
episodes.title: Tributes & Triangles

episodes.synopsis: Zoe is conflicted about seeing her estranged father. Lemon tries to befriend Zoe to keep her affair with Lavon a secret.
episodes.title: Heart to Hart

episodes.synopsis: Zoe makes a romantic connection with one of her patients, Jesse. Magnolia has some "interesting" plans in store for Lemon's bachelorette party.
episodes.title: Bachelorettes & Bullets

episodes.synopsis: After a night of partying, Wade wakes up with a massive hangover, an uninvited houseguest and no memory of what happened the night before.
episodes.title: Destiny & Denial

episodes.synopsis: Wade must swallow his pride and ask Zoe to be his teammate for the BlueBell Battle. George and Lemon discuss their relationship.
episodes.title: The Race & The Relationship

episodes.synopsis: Zoe blames herself when a friend faces a health crisis. Wade considers opening his own bar in BlueBell. Lemon plans a romantic night for George.
episodes.title: Disaster Drills & Departures

episodes.synopsis: George and Lemon prepare for their wedding day and, while taking shelter from a storm, Zoe finds herself stranded in a barn with Wade.
episodes.title: The Big Day

episodes.synopsis: After George confesses his feelings to Zoe, she finds herself having to make a tough decision between George and Wade, leaving the two guys at odds.
episodes.title: I Fall to Pieces

episodes.synopsis: When Rose enlists Zoe's help in throwing the first BlueBellapalooza, Zoe is forced to ask Wade to convince his old bandmate to be the musical act.
episodes.title: Always on My Mind

episodes.synopsis: Zoe is upset that her alumni magazine has listed her as "retired." To be considerate of her feelings, George informs Lemon that he is going on a date.
episodes.title: If It Makes You Happy

episodes.synopsis: Zoe becomes jealous after seeing Wade with another woman. Zoe decides that two can play at that game, and sets up a date with Ruby's cousin.
episodes.title: Suspicious Minds

episodes.synopsis: Concerned for George after learning that he has a sleepwalking issue, Zoe decides to conduct a sleep study, forcing her to cancel her plans with Wade.
episodes.title: Walkin' After Midnight

episodes.synopsis: With the mayoral election looming, Lavon and Ruby continue to be tied in the polls, leaving Lemon no choice but to use some creative methods to win.
episodes.title: I Walk the Line

episodes.synopsis: After Zoe treats the high school football team, she learns that Max, who happens to be Rose's new crush, has become infatuated with her instead.
episodes.title: Baby, Don't Get Hooked on Me

episodes.synopsis: Both Zoe and Lemon are having a difficult time accepting Lavon and Ruby's new relationship, so they decide to find out Ruby's true intentions.
episodes.title: Achy Breaky Hearts

episodes.synopsis: Despite her apprehensions, Zoe bids on Wade's basket at the upcoming charity picnic auction, but is surprised that she is not the only one interested.
episodes.title: Sparks Fly

episodes.synopsis: Zoe is anxious about her critical mother visiting for the holidays. To avoid spending quality time with her mother, Zoe busies herself with a patient.
episodes.title: Blue Christmas

episodes.synopsis: With Lavon preoccupied by his personal life, he lets his mayoral duties slip at the worst time, as BlueBell's Pioneer Day is fast approaching.
episodes.title: Old Alabama

episodes.synopsis: George's parents are surprised he has a new girlfriend. George's mother has a plan to force George and Zoe to address their feelings for one another.
episodes.title: Islands in the Stream

episodes.synopsis: When the Health Department alerts Zoe about a flu epidemic, she puts the town on lockdown. Lemon's plan for the perfect night with Walt goes awry.
episodes.title: Lovesick Blues

episodes.synopsis: George is given the responsibility of watching Tansy's most prized possession -- her dog -- but panics when the dog goes missing.
episodes.title: Take Me Home, Country Roads

episodes.synopsis: Wade is excited to compete in the Battle of the Bands, but Zoe's suggestion that George play in the band ultimately backfires.
episodes.title: The Gambler

episodes.synopsis: With the sudden nuptials of Wanda in BlueBell, Zoe agrees to be maid of honor, which entails the difficult job of watching Wanda's mother, Betsy.
episodes.title: Where I Lead Me

episodes.synopsis: Zoe tries to keep her feelings about Wade under control, causing her to become overly protective when it comes to Rose and her boyfriend.
episodes.title: We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together

episodes.synopsis: Lavon's big plan to make BlueBell a Spring Break destination hit a roadblock when the competing town tries to lure the partiers away.
episodes.title: Why Don't We Get Drunk

episodes.synopsis: George and Zoe refuse to play Romeo and Juliet in the community theater, but eventually agree just to prove to everyone that they are over each other.
episodes.title: This Kiss

episodes.synopsis: After Zoe tricks Jonah into spilling a secret about Brick, she unintentionally makes things worse for Brick in his love life.
episodes.title: If Tomorrow Never Comes

episodes.synopsis: Zoe's attempts at online dating hit a few snags until Rose and Max take matters into their own hands and play matchmaker.
episodes.title: I'm Moving on

episodes.synopsis: After having a rough time in BlueBell, Zoe decides a little time in New York City might be the perfect opportunity to give her some perspective.
episodes.title: On the Road Again

episodes.synopsis: After spending the summer in New York City, Zoe is ready to make her move more permanent, but first she must return to BlueBell for one last thing.
episodes.title: Who Says You Can't Go Home

episodes.synopsis: Lemon crashes Lavon and AnnaBeth's quiet dinner party with Alabama's most eligible bachelor and risks her ruse with Wade being exposed.
episodes.title: Friends in Low Places

episodes.synopsis: Zoe's contract might keep her from seeing patients in BlueBell. Lavon gets baseball fever when he gets a chance to bring a minor league team to town.
episodes.title: Take This Job and Shove It

episodes.synopsis: Lemon's fallout with the Belles gets her blacklisted from the Junior League's Halloween Masquerade. Zoe helps AnnaBeth through a health scare.
episodes.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night

episodes.synopsis: Zoe learns what the townsfolk think of Joel and doesn't like what she hears. Lavon asks Lemon to help him get into the Gazebos of Alabama calendar.
episodes.title: How Do You Like Me Now?

episodes.synopsis: Joel and Zoe's dream home turns out to be owned by a member of Zoe's extended family. AnnaBeth seems a little too eager for Lavon to go out of town.
episodes.title: Family Tradition

episodes.synopsis: Zoe thinks Joel and Wade spend too much quality time together -- especially when it distracts Joel from writing. Lavon avoids talking to AnnaBeth.
episodes.title: I Run to You

episodes.synopsis: Lemon tries to dig up dirt on one of her dad's exes before he makes a rash decision. Zoe invites her uncle for Hanukkah, much to Vivian's dismay.
episodes.title: Miracles

episodes.synopsis: When Zoe learns that Wade is interested in dating someone close to her, she tries everything she can do to put a stop to it.
episodes.title: Something to Talk About

episodes.synopsis: When Brick is asked to help with the local cabaret, he nominates Zoe to save the day. Lavon feels defeated about the possible merger with Fillmore.
episodes.title: Star of the Show

episodes.synopsis: Wade makes an effort to win over Vivian's son. Lavon tries to save Bluebell by suggesting it be declared an historic town.
episodes.title: One More Last Chance

episodes.synopsis: Zoe and Brick strike a deal: Zoe will help get the town healthy in exchange for Brick's financial assistance with her home renovations.
episodes.title: Should've Been a Cowboy

episodes.synopsis: A reluctant Zoe allows Joel to throw her a birthday bash, but party plans go awry when her mother makes an unexpected visit.
episodes.title: Act Naturally

episodes.synopsis: As her mother's newest client, Zoe hopes for some undivided attention. Brick enlists Wade's help in planning a welcome-home party for Lemon.
episodes.title: Here You Come Again

episodes.synopsis: The town isn't responding to Lavon's plans for a BlueBell Renaissance Faire, and Zoe isn't pleased with Joel's choice of renovation contractors.
episodes.title: Ring of Fire

episodes.synopsis: While Zoe and Joel share home remodeling frustrations, Wade brokers peace between George and Lemon so they can team up for a business venture.
episodes.title: Carrying Your Love With Me

episodes.synopsis: Zoe thinks her relationship with Lavon is cursed; Vivian's son looks to Wade for advice; and George and Lemon try to avoid each other at work.
episodes.title: A Good Run of Bad Luck

episodes.synopsis: Wade asks Vivian out for a nice evening but is put off when her ex-husband starts texting her. Zoe and Lemon turn to each other for advice.
episodes.title: Back in the Saddle Again

episodes.synopsis: Zoe finds herself uncomfortably in the middle of Wade and Vivian's relationship. Under protest, George agrees to date a Bible school teacher.
episodes.title: A Better Man

episodes.synopsis: While Wade is upset with Zoe over his relationship issues, she decides to lay low and help George out with his problems with Lemon.
episodes.title: Together Again

episodes.synopsis: Wade cautions Zoe against getting involved in his father's love life, and Lemon's attempt to raise Fancie's profile backfires.
episodes.title: Stuck

episodes.synopsis: Zoe tries to be a supportive friend to Wade, but when she makes a grand gesture, he's forced to make a tough decision about his future.
episodes.title: Second Chance
